title: Capital infrastructure tax credit
context: [ยง241-4.4] Capital infrastructure tax credit. The capital infrastructure tax credit established by section 235-17.5 shall be operative for this chapter for taxable years beginning after December 31, 2013. [L 2014, c 200, ยง3] Note Section applies to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2013. L 2014, c 200, ยง6.
